overview: To escape from his everyday life, Hee-Tae visits the area where he grew up in search for his ex-girlfriend Tae-Eun. It is the place of his childhood memories, good ones, as well as ones he would rather forget. Torn between past and future, guilt and desire, will Hee-Tae be able to find Tae-Eun and go back to the past?
title: Memory Lane
